document_data.caption: A map of Moray showing Kork on the eastern coast.
document_data.name: Kork
document_data.mainbody: '''Kork''' was a small village located on the isle of [[Moray]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The village was located on the eastern coast of Moray along the [[Strait of the Leviathan]].
document_data.History: The inhabitants of Kork were wiped out during a raid by the savage [[Black Blood Tribe]]. Following the attack, Kork was eventually repopulated by [[mercenary|mercenaries]] and settlers from [[Amn]]. The Amnian settlers constructed a road leading to Moray's interior to gain better access to the valuable peat and kryne found there.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|10}}
